original_title: UFC Fight Night 29: Maia vs. Shields
overview: UFC Fight Night 29: Maia vs. Shields was a mixed martial arts event held on October 9, 2013, at the Ginásio José Corrêa in Barueri, Brazil. The event was headlined by a welterweight bout between Demian Maia and Jake Shields.
title: UFC Fight Night 29: Maia vs. Shields
